name: From Jerusalem to Dead Sea - Must be there if you travell in Israel
description: Relaxation in Dead Sea is incredible.Only less from hour from Jerusalem i'll take you to the lowest place in the world Dead Sea where you can relax,put the dead sea mud and little bit swim on the salt water.I will pick up 1-4 persons from hotel and bring you to the northen parts of Dead Sea to the first two beaches of Dead Sea called Kalya and Neve Midbar.Entance fee to the beaches are about 13-17$ per person.
